meanings.sent1: She stood unblenched in the face of danger.
meanings.sent2: The brave knight remained unblenched in battle.
meanings.sent3: Even when the scary movie played, she stayed unblenched.
meanings.sent4: His unblenched determination inspired others to be courageous.
meanings.sent5: The unblenched firefighter rushed into the burning building to save the cat.

meanings.sent1: Her unblenched cheeks showed her embarrassment.
meanings.sent2: Despite the cold, his face remained unblenched.
meanings.sent3: The clown's unblenched makeup made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: The unblenched sky turned a beautiful shade of pink at sunset.
meanings.sent5: The unblenched flower stood out among the others in the garden.

meanings.sent1: The unblenched wood had a natural, warm color.
meanings.sent2: The unblenched fabric retained its original vibrancy.
meanings.sent3: The unblenched flour gave the bread a unique taste.
meanings.sent4: Her unblenched hair shimmered in the sunlight.
meanings.sent5: The unblenched walls of the old castle held many stories within them.
